DOC.brief_title: The CYPHER™ Stent Study Patients With Small de Novo Coronary Artery Lesions .
DOC.detailed_description: This international , multicenter ( 10 site ) , nonrandomized , historically control study patient De Novo coronary artery lesion small vessel treat CYPHER™ ( sirolimus-eluting ) stent compare small vessel tercile uncoated Bx VELOCITYTM Stent patient SIRIUS Trial . A total 100 patient enrol study . Patients de novo native coronary artery lesion > =15mm < =30mm length > =2.25 mm < =2.75 mm diameter visual estimation treat CYPHER™ ( sirolimus-eluting ) stent . Patients follow 30 day , 6 , 8 , 9 month 1 , 2 3 year post-procedure , repeat angiography 8 month . In patient Intravascular Ultrasound ( IVUS ) perform ( case cross success ) initial procedure . An IVUS control also do 8 month follow assess neo-intimal growth remodel . This single lesion treatment study . Patients may lesions treated treatment intend lesion small vessel ( non-target lesion may locate target vessel ! ) . Post-procedural treatment another lesion allow 30-day follow-up contact complete case clinically need . It anticipate total length study 39 month : 3 month complete patient enrollment 3 year follow-up .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis angina pectoris define Canadian Cardiovascular Society Classification ( CCS 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 ) OR unstable angina pectoris ( Braunwald Classification B & C 12 ) OR patient document silent ischemia ; 2 . Single treatment de novo lesion small vessel ( 2.25 2.75 mm ) major coronary artery patient single multivessel disease . Patients multiple lesion include lesion successfully treat prior treatment intend lesion small vessel . 3 . Target vessel diameter > =2.25 < =2.75mm ( visual estimation ) ; 4 . Target lesion length > =15 < =30 mm . 1 . Patient experience Qwave nonQwave myocardial infarction document total CK > 2 time normal within precede 24 hour CK CKMB remain normal time treatment ; 2 . Has unstable angina classify Braunwald A ( 1 , 2 , 3 ) B & C 3 ; 3 . Unprotected leave main coronary disease > =50 % stenosis ; 4 . Significant ( > 50 % ) stenosis proximal distal target lesion might require revascularization impede inflow runoff ; 5 . Have ostial target lesion ; 6 . Lesion < 2.25 > 2.75 mm diameter ; 7 . Totally occluded vessel ( TIMI 0 level ) ; 8 . Documented leave ventricular ejection fraction £30 % ; 9 . Intention treat target lesion direct stenting procedure .
